questions.question: Do you think we will one day spend most or all of our lives in virtual reality worlds?

And isn't it nicer to have a high-tech future with more creative classes than one with more dependent classes?
And I would say a GitHub like, if you just have this vision, GitHub plus TikTok combined, is it possible?
